bibl.title: A Closer Look at O. Mich. I 126.
bibl.note: P. Mich. I, 126: a corrected version of the text. The importance of the exact findspot: this ostracon was found during the 1926/1927 season of excavations in Karanis, in a house where it was one of 10 more ostraca. The documents, published at different places in O. Mich. I, relate to the same people.
VAN MINNEN Peter, A Closer Look at O. Mich. I 126.
